Cisco ProtectLink Web

The optional Trend Micro ProtectLink Web service provides security for your network. It filters website addresses (URLs) and blocks potentially malicious websites. Refer to these topics:

  • Getting Started with Cisco ProtectLink Web
  • Specifying the Global Settings for Approved URLs and Clients
  • Enabling Web Protection for URL Filtering
  • Enabling Email Protection
  • Updating the ProtectLink License

NOTE     For more information about this Cisco product, visit the Cisco ProtectLink Gateway information page at www.cisco.com/en/US/products/ps9953/index.html
